Name: Droid Warfare
About the game: (This game is in Early Access. Levels and storyline are still being developed at this time. Full game release Scheduled for release by November of 2022) A Science-fiction war game based on future alien-tech invasions and a international world hero. An exoplanet named Pumara is a highly resourceful world & is civilized by cybernetic androids. An army of Alien- based Androids launches an international invasion in attempt to take control of the planet. The citizens of Pumara formed an alliance to fight the alien forces & to protect their planet. The game currently has 10 main levels (more levels and mini-games coming soon) Player has 6 Different weapons * The Power Gun * Laser Gun * Laser Blaster * Shock Laser Gun * Smart Laser Gun * Grenade Gun Controls (Mouse & Keyboard) WASD or Arrow Keys = Move / Side-step player. Mouse Axis Movement = Rotate Player. Shift Key = Run (while moving forward) Left Mouse Button = Shoot projectiles. C Key = Crouch player. (Zoom & Aim) 1 - 6 Keys = Switch weapons. Space = Jump.
